analysis.description:
TokenTimelock.constructor (/unique_contracts/0xa9f9aeb4f2246f691686155aecf298237dffb166.sol#644-655) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(releaseTime > block.timestamp) (/unique_contracts/0xa9f9aeb4f2246f691686155aecf298237dffb166.sol#652)

TokenTimelock.release (/unique_contracts/0xa9f9aeb4f2246f691686155aecf298237dffb166.sol#681-696) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp >= _releaseTime) (/unique_contracts/0xa9f9aeb4f2246f691686155aecf298237dffb166.sol#684-689)
